flawed_nl_solution:
He got 200*0.9=<<200*0.9=180>>180 RSVP
Of those only 180*0.8=<<180*0.8=144>>144 people showed up
So only 144-10=<<144-10=137>>137 got him gifts and hence need thank you cards.
#### 137

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 134, not 137. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
